tape( 'the function ignores unrecognized/unsupported options', function test( t ) {
	var options;
	var opts;
	var err;

	options = {};
	opts = {
		'beep': true,
		'boop': 3.14,
		'foo': 'bar'
	};

	err = validate( options, opts );
	t.equal( err, null, 'returns null' );

	t.deepEqual( options, {}, 'does not set unrecognized options' );
	t.end();
});
